name: The Catcher
description:
The Catcher (related to the game 1980, and 1980: The Quiz. You can go play those games by checking my profile page, or else you won't know what is happening.)

Recording 002: "Mom... Dad? Where are you? I'm stuck in here! H̴̛͔̽͛͊͐̎͘͝͠ẻ̵̢̤̳̺̦̱͐͜ͅ is coming out!"

*distant screeching can be heard* 

"DAD! LET ME OUT!! PLEASE!!"

.̴̧̛̟͙̮̖̩̤̖̭̲̭̀̾̔͛̌̀̓̈̒̈̀̒͊͒͆̈́͒̐͊̍͋́̈́̈̓̒͌͘.̷̡̨̧͈̲̹̞̣͈̩̜̗̖͇̙͍͈̙͓͚̬̳͎̻̽̽̐̈́̿͂̈́͆.̴̡̢̡̡̪̣͇͈̣̘̺̙̠̜̰͓̭̙̰͓̞͙͈̺͚͙̹̫͓̣͚̺̗͔̓̾̐̑̾̽̈́̀͆̔̽́͊͛̂́̒̐̌̎̀̈́̉̈̔̕̚̕̚̚͝   can be heard leaving the tv*

Recording cuts

"I hope you will have the best time ever playing this game! Shhh... I totally didn't base this on the new one, Mario!"

You, the player, are trying out his new game. Have f̶̡̧̤͙̖̲̱̌̊͒͜u̸͙̅̀n̸̢̺̙̫̳̲͍̼͈͈̗̘̜͊͝.̵̢͉̘̦͛̋͋͑̽̃ .
